vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.4.17; married to Heber (H2268H)
§ Jael = "mountain goat"
the wife of Heber the Kenite who killed the general Sisera as he slept by driving a peg through his temples into the ground
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   esposa de Héber, quenita; en tiempos de los jueces
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅億 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "山羊"
希百的妻子, 基尼人希百的妻子, 在西西拉將軍沉睡時, 將一個橛子釘入他的鬢邊, 直穿到地上釘死
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅亿 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "山羊"
希百的妻子, 基尼人希百的妻子, 在西西拉将军沉睡时, 将一个橛子钉入他的鬓边, 直穿到地上钉死
